metadata.title: CVE-2021-22252 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A confusion between tag and branch names in GitLab CE/EE affecting allversions since 13.7 allowed a Developer to access protected CI variableswhich should only be accessible to Maintainers

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
